room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: I had my mom and brother here from out of town. I surprised them with this. We loved it. What a great time we had. Well done mind quest!!!! I'm coming back soon. I can't wait to see what else you have to offer. We made it out with 5 minutes to spare!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: So much fun! A unique and thrilling adventure!! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Most fun we've had in Orlando! Cyber Crash is the hardest to complete. You get one hour, we were able to upload the virus with 4 seconds to spare!!! Extremely nerve racking!!! A for sure must in Orlando!

room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Went with a group of guys on the weekend. It was challenging and entertaining. Brooke explained the objective to the group really well!

room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Absolutely a blast! Can't wait to do it again! They did a great job of hiding all the clues right in front of you!

room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: Cyber was awesome! People working the place were down to earth and cool. Made it a good time and room was legit.

room_title: Escape room "Cyber Crash" by MindQuest Escape Games in Orlando
review: We have played all four games offered at Mindquest Live, completing them all for the exception of Cyber Crash which the staff indicate is the hardest one they offer. We enjoyed the Diamond Heist game the most but would highly recommend any of them. Games: Diamond Heist and The Bomb are of a similar difficulty level (the easiest ones they offer), Mad Scientist was much, much harder, and Cyber Crash is the hardest - and we have yet to fully complete it but we keep trying!! Hoping Mindquest Live will off some new games as our family enjoys them so much. Staff are friendly, the games are well organized, appropriately difficult, and fun, and the lobby is decorated with everything steampunk which is a lot of fun to explore if you have to wait a few minutes for your game. Go!
